attributes.action: 100% percent mortgages for people who prove they can pay regular private rent
attributes.background: Working families that pay regular and on time payments to private landlords for renting a property and not being able to save for deposit. If 100% mortgages came into action a lot more people will be able to own there own home and have something to leave there children when there older.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on mortgages in individual cases. That's a decision for mortgage lenders. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to take action to support certain people in getting a mortgage. For example, you could ask the UK Government to act as a guarantor for some people's mortgages, if that's what you would like to happen.
